snippet: A choice by some private unions to back Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, aiding an offensive against their public-sector brethren, exposes a deepening fissure in the labor movement.
abstract: Choice by some private-sector unions to back New York State Gov Andrew M Cuomo, aiding an offensive against their public-sector brethren, exposes a deepening fissure in the labor movement; Committee to Save New York aid to a business coalition shows how battles over government spending, especially at the state level, have deepened longstanding tensions in the labor movement.
lead_paragraph: A choice by some private unions to back Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, aiding an offensive against their public-sector brethren, exposes a deepening fissure in the labor movement.

headline.seo: Union Donations to Business Group Show Fracture in Labor Movement
headline.main: Donations to Key Cuomo Ally Show a Rift Among Unions
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Ally in Fighting Unions Got Labor’s Financial Support

keywords.value: Building and Construction Trade Council of Greater New York
keywords.name: organizations
